name: Alien Invasion Tower Defense
description: Alien Invasion TD is a new strategy 3D game with an exciting new design, campaign mode, endless mode, players custom-built levels and PVP online multiplayer, defend against waves of approaching enemies by placing your defense towers, recruiting units,use special attacks, boosts and more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
